document.full_text: doctors say new data give them more confidence that the cheaper drug avastin works as well as lucentis in treating blindness from macular degeneration, but they will need to spend more time explaining potential risks.
document.title: roche eye drug debate moves into patient rooms
lines_and_colors: doctors say new data give them more confidence that the cheaper drug avastin works as well as lucentis in treating blindness from macular degeneration, but they will need to spend more time explaining potential risks.
